Package fko.chessly.ui.JavaFX_GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutDialog  
    AboutDialog_Controller  
    BoardPane
    The BoardPanel class displays the board of a given game.
    EngineInfoUpdater
    This class updates the engine information by using a thread that call updateUI() regularly.
    InfoTextArea
    This is an extension of a TextArea which limits the amount of output to avoid out of memory if a lot of text is added.
    JavaFX_GUI  
    JavaFX_GUI_Controller
    Main Controller for the Chessly JavaFX user interface.
    MoveListModel
    This class shows a list of moves in a table within a JScrollpane.
    NewGameDialog  
    NewGameDialog_Controller  
    PlatformUtil
    Provides a few helper methods for the JavaFX Platform
    PlayerClockUpdater  
    WindowStateFX
    Represents a properties file with the last window states.
